text.*:
Mantlepiece figurine by Royal Doulton
Cobbler HN1706
Orange Lady HN1953

This is a list of Royal Doulton figurines in ascending order by HN number. HN is named after Harry Nixon (1886-1955), head of the Royal Doulton painting department who joined Doulton in 1900.[1] This list includes the HN number, the title of the Royal Doulton figurine, the designer(s), the date introduced, and if discontinued, the date discontinued.

This is a dynamic list and may never be able to satisfy particular standards for completeness. You can help by expanding it with reliably sourced entries.
